Unemployment benefits

Representativeness disclaimer

These analyses are based on responses collected from 8051 caregivers between the dates of April 06, 2020 and September 08, 2020. These caregivers represent a range of voices: 10.38% are Black/African American, 20.08% are LatinX, and 27.26% live at or below 1.5 times the federal poverty line. Proportions/percentages are calculated based on the item-level response rates, not out of the total sample size. The data for these analyses are not weighted.

Lose job if take sick leave

If you were unable to work because you lost your child care provider or your child’s school shut down, were you approved to receive unemployment benefits?

Navigating unemployment benefits

How difficult was it to navigate the application process?

Note there are not enough responses to this question to examine change over time or sub group analyses.

Directed to specific programs
